item.title: Page Layouts
item.dc:creator: Brian Gardner
item.content:encoded:
Below is a list of 6 post/page layouts that come with the Genesis theme framework:
  • Content/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Content
  • Content/Sidebar/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Sidebar/Content
  • Sidebar/Content/Sidebar
  • Full Width Content

item.title: Typography
item.dc:creator: Brian Gardner
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the formatting page for the Mobile First theme. We're glad you are interested in using this and want to show you how elements look. Want to see what a blockquote looks like?
This is an example of a WordPress post, you could edit this to put information about your site so readers know where you are coming from. You can create as many posts as you like in order to share with your readers what is on your mind.
Perhaps you'd like to see what an unordered list looks like?
  • Unordered list item #1
  • Unordered list item #2
  • Unordered list item #3
Or you'd prefer to see what an ordered list looks like?
  1. Ordered list item #1
  2. Ordered list item #2
  3. Ordered list item #3
How about the styling for threaded comments? Starting with Version 2.7, WordPress has support for threaded comments. This is where you reply to a comment that was previously made, and makes reading comments easier. Take a look at the comments of this post and you will see. Lastly, care to see what the headings look like?

Headline 1

Headline 2

Headline 3

Headline 4

Headline 5
Headline 6

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Hi Brian,
I am so happy that I stumpled upon your site and the great information and tools you provide. I have a fairly new website on wordpress, but want to change the theme to this new one to make it more expansive and drive traffic. How can I add this theme in wordpres ? I would download this file and save it in my folders, and it would be in the plugin areas? I am so excited great website clean.
Thank You,
Lori English. http://Lorislittleslessons.com. (:

Hi Brian,
I am so happy that I stumpled upon your site and the great information and tools you provide. I have a fairly new website on wordpress, but want to change the theme to this new one to make it more expansive and drive traffic. How can I add this theme in wordpres ? I would download this file and save it in my folders, and it would be in the plugin areas? I am so excited great website clean.
Thank You,
Lori English. http://Lorislittleslessons.com. (:

Good morning. I recently purchased the Genesis Framework and downloaded "Mobile First" I spent a few hours configuring it and have run into a problem. I cannot get the Primary Sidebar to configure properly. For some reason, the search/social/recent post widgets are loading along side of my newsletter form, not beneath it. Please take a look at the site, and if you have any input as to how I can fix this it would be appreciated. www.ucroad.com

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: This is an example of a comment made on a post. You can either edit the comment, delete the comment or reply to the comment. Use this as a place to respond to the post or to share what you are thinking.
This is an example of a nested threaded comment which is new in WordPress 2.7. This is where you can reply to a comment that was previously made, and visually makes reading comments to much easier.
